arts.ttl: Where to watch USMNT vs Australia: TV channel, live stream for friendly ahead of 2026 World Cup
arts.sum: United States and Australia clash this week to continue preparations for the 2026 World Cup. Gregg Berhalter will lead the USMNT to reinforce the key points in his squad and improve step by step, as the nation he leads will be one of the three hosts in the next international mega cup. Australia will also continue their warm-up matches when they face the United States, also away from home.
